titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4539) making appropriations for the Treasury Department, the United States Postal Service, the Executive Office of the President, and certain Independent Agencies, for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1995, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-537, by Mr. Beilenson.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 4539 with 1 hour of general debate. All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived. Measure will be read by paragraph. Bill is open to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 171.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 236 - 177 (Roll no. 227).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/8/1994--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4539 (FY 1995 appropriations for the Department of the Treasury, the United States Postal Service, the Executive Office of the President, and certain independent agencies).
